help_text:
## How to mark up text ## Headers ``` # Header 1 ## Header 2 ### Header 3 #### Header 4 ##### Header 5 ###### Header 6 ``` ## Bold ``` **Bold** ``` ## Italic ``` *Italic* ``` ## Lists ``` - Item 1 - Item 2 - Subitem 2.1 - Subitem 2.2 ``` ``` 1. First 2. Second 3. Third ``` ## Links ``` [example url](https://example.com) ``` ## Images ``` ![example image](https://picsum.photos/200/300/?blur) ``` ## Horizontal Rule ``` --- ``` ## Blockquotes ``` > This is a blockquote. ``` ## X(Twitter) Embed 
```X
1674806403922546688
```
## Youtube Embed 
```Youtube
Cs0ubfKJJBY
```
